article_title: Baby Boomer Bubble Will Bring Huge Shifts in Work Force

article_metadata.author:
BY BRIAN SMITH

bsmith@magicvalley.com

og.description: TWIN FALLS • One-fifth of Idaho Power’s employees are eligible for retirement. By 2024, that number will balloon to nearly half the utility’s 2,000 employees.
